name: Tales of Midlair
description:
Tales of Midlair follows Wilkin, a young villager who wants revenge for the destruction the King did to his village. On the way to the King, Wilkin will find powerful elemental mages and will learn their elemental power as he progresses. 

Tales of Midlair is a singleplayer, 3rd person action game that revolves around the effective use of elemental spells against his foes.

This game was made as an academic project at Feevale University.

The team:

Giordano Jankovski;

Junior Mercker;

Lucas Schierholt;

Mateus Dalosto;

Wesley Trindade.
